languages.text: "Я слишком долго был здесь. Слишком долго служил инструментом богохульным выродкам — судьба, позорная для воина Всеотца, и стыд за то жжет мою душу. Когда я понял, что вновь стал их игрушкой, что вновь один ксенос натравливает меня на своих врагов... Я подумал, что так теперь будет вечно. Разум не мог смириться с подобным срамом и трусливо спрятался, а место его заняла жажда".

"Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."
languages.original_text: "Я слишком долго был здесь. Слишком долго служил инструментом богохульным выродкам — судьба, позорная для воина Всеотца, и стыд за то жжет мою душу. Когда я понял, что вновь стал их игрушкой, что вновь один ксенос натравливает меня на своих врагов... Я подумал, что так теперь будет вечно. Разум не мог смириться с подобным срамом и трусливо спрятался, а место его заняла жажда".

traits.locale_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous spawn — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what burns at my soul. Once I saw that I had once again become putty in their hands, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. The mind could not accept the indignity of it, so the mind hid like a coward would. Only the thirst remained."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

Once I saw that I had once again become putty in their hands, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. The mind could not accept the indignity of it, so the mind hid like a coward would. Only the thirst remained."

My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Cela fait trop longtemps que je suis là. Trop longtemps que je suis l'outil de ces misérables. Quel terrible destin pour un combattant du Père de Tous ! La honte consume mon âme. Quand j'ai réalisé que j'allais encore une fois être leur jouet, qu'un xénos avait décidé une fois de plus que je devais affronter l'un de ses adversaires... J'ai cru que cela ne cesserait jamais. Mon esprit ne pouvait accepter une telle indignité, et il s'est dissimulé comme un lâche. Il ne restait alors plus que la soif de sang. »
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: « Cela fait trop longtemps que je suis là. Cela fait trop longtemps que je suis l'outil de ces salauds. Quel terrible destin pour un combattant du Père de Tous ! La honte consume mon âme. Quand j'ai réalisé que j'allais encore une fois être leur jouet, qu'un xénos avait décidé une fois de plus que je devais affronter l'un de ses adversaires... J'ai cru que cela ne cesserait jamais. Mon esprit ne pouvait accepter une telle indignité, alors il s'est dissimulé comme un lâche. Il ne restait alors plus que la soif de sang. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我已经在这里呆得太久了。这么长时间以来，我一直被那些邪恶的异形当成工具。身为全父的战士，这样的命运实在是过于耻辱，我的羞愧感灼烧着我的灵魂。每当我看到我再次沦为他们的玩物，再次为了异形去杀死其他异形……我就会以为这样的命运永远都不会结束。我的心灵无法接受这样的侮辱，于是我的理智像个懦夫一样躲了起来，只剩下无尽的饥渴。”
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: “我已经在这里呆得太久了。这么长时间以来，我一直被那些邪恶的异形当成工具。身为全父的战士，这样的命运实在是过于耻辱，我的羞愧感灼烧着我的灵魂。每当我看到，我再次成为他们手中的杀戮工具，再次为了异形去杀死其他异形……我就会以为这样的命运永远都不会结束。我的心灵无法接受这样的侮辱，于是我的理智像个懦夫一样躲了起来，只剩下无尽的饥渴。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「あまりにも長い間、俺はここにいた。あまりにも長い間、俺は不義を行う哀れな者どもの道具として扱われてきた。それは全知の父の戦士にとっては恥ずべき運命であり、その恥こそが俺の魂を焦がした。そして再び異種族の言いなりになって、敵と戦わされていると分かった時は…それが永遠に続くと思った。俺の心はその屈辱を受け入れられず、臆病者のように身を隠した。そして渇きだけが残った」
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: 「あまりにも長い間、俺はここにいた。あまりにも長い間、俺はよこしまな野郎どもの道具として扱われてきた。それは全知の父の戦士にとっては恥ずべき運命であり、その恥こそが俺の魂を焦がした。そして再びゼノの言いなりになって、敵と戦わされていると分かった時は…それが永遠に続くと思った。俺の心はその屈辱を受け入れられず、臆病者のように身を隠した。そして渇きだけが残った」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Zu lange bin ich schon hier. Zu lange habe ich als Werkzeug sündhafter Mistkerle gedient – ein beschämendes Schicksal für den Krieger des Allvaters. Es ist diese Schande, die mir die Seele versengt. Als ich erkannte, dass ich wieder zu Wachs in ihren Händen wurde, dass mich erneut ein Xenos auf seine Feinde stürzen ließ ... Da dachte ich, das würde ewig so weitergehen. Mein Verstand konnte diese Schmach nicht akzeptieren, also versteckte er sich, wie ein Feigling. Nur der Durst blieb."
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: "Zu lange bin ich schon hier. Zu lange habe ich als Werkzeug sündhafter Bastarde gedient – ein beschämendes Schicksal für den Krieger des Allvaters. Es ist diese Schande, die mir die Seele versengt. Als ich erkannte, dass ich wieder zu Wachs in ihren Händen wurde, dass mich erneut ein Xenos auf seine Feinde stürzen ließ ... Da dachte ich, das würde ewig so weitergehen. Mein Verstand konnte diese Schmach nicht akzeptieren, also versteckte er sich, wie ein Feigling. Nur der Durst blieb."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Hace mucho tiempo que me consumo aquí. Hace mucho que no soy más que una mera herramienta de unos degenerados impíos, un destino vergonzoso para un guerrero del Padre de Todo, y vergüenza es lo que me abrasa el alma. Cuando vi que había vuelto a convertirme en su marioneta, que otro xenos me había lanzado contra sus enemigos... creí que el ciclo no se acabaría nunca. Mi mente no pudo soportar tamaña ignominia, así que se ocultó como haría un cobarde. Tan solo me quedó la sed de sangre».
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho tiempo que me consumo aquí. Hace mucho que no soy más que una mera herramienta de unos bastardos impíos, un destino vergonzoso para un guerrero del Padre de Todo, y vergüenza es lo que me abrasa el alma. Cuando vi que había vuelto a convertirme en un títere, que otro xenos me había lanzado contra sus enemigos... creí que el ciclo no se acabaría nunca. Mi mente no pudo soportar tamaña ignominia, así que mi mente se ocultó como haría un cobarde. Tan solo me quedó la sed de sangre».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Gereğinden fazladır buradayım. Gereğinden fazladır doğru yoldan dönmüş alçaklar beni kendi planlarına alet etti... Yücebaba'nın savaşçıları için utanç çevirici bir kader bu. İşte ruhumu yakıp kavuran da bu utanç. Yeniden onların elinde oyuncak olduğumu görünce... Bir zenonun daha beni düşmanlarına saldığını fark edince... Bu iş ebediyen sürecek sandım. Onurumun böylesine kırılmasını kaldıramayan aklım, korkakça saklandı. Geriye sadece içimdeki susamışlık kaldı."
languages.original_text: "Too long have I been here. Too long have I served as a tool of unrighteous wretches — a shameful fate for the Allfather's warrior, and shame is what scorches my soul. When I saw that I had once again become their plaything, that yet another xenos had set me upon his foes... I thought it would go on forever. My mind could not accept the indignity of it, so my mind hid like a coward would. Only thirst remained."

traits.locale_text: "Gereğinden fazladır buradayım. Gereğinden fazladır doğru yoldan dönmüş alçaklar beni kendi planlarına alet etti... Yücebaba'nın savaşçıları için utanç çevirici bir kader bu. İşte ruhumu yakıp kavuran da bu utanç. Yeniden onların elinde oyuncak olduğumu görünce... Bir zenonun daha beni düşmanlarına saldığını fark edince... Bu iş ebediyen sürecek sandım. Onurumun böylesine kırılmasını kaldıramayan aklım, korkakça saklandı. Geriye sadece içimdeki susamışlık kaldı."
